EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2019.Charlotte Post Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending SpringOne Tour 2019 in Charlotte!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HiÂ {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Thanks for coming out to Charlotte earlier this week to participate and enhance our community. Looking for slides from SpringOne Tour? You can find them, along with blogs, videos and all things Spring related here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-tour-charlotte]]>.
Get started <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springone-tour-charlotte-q119]]> with Spring on Cloud Foundry: for free on the public cloud, or on your workstation. I hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events]]>!
Thanks,
Tasha Isenberg
